SQL.LOAD: SELECT transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_claim_number, xml_created_date, xml_service_center_code, xml_customer_name, xml_identification_number, xml_address1, xml_address2, xml_city, xml_region, xml_postal_code, xml_home_phone, xml_work_phone, xml_email, xml_contact_name, xml_product_code, xml_description, xml_item_description, xml_serial_number, xml_invoice_number, xml_problem_description, xml_method_of_repair, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, trans_dtl_new_claim_id FROM elp_trans_dtl_new_claim WHERE trans_dtl_new_claim_id = :trans_dtl_new_claim_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_trans_dtl_new_claim SET transaction_log_header_id = :transaction_log_header_id, item_number = :item_number, response = :response, response_detail = :response_detail, xml_claim_number = :xml_claim_number, xml_created_date = :xml_created_date, xml_service_center_code = :xml_service_center_code, xml_customer_name = :xml_customer_name, xml_identification_number = :xml_identification_number, xml_address1 = :xml_address1, xml_address2 = :xml_address2, xml_city = :xml_city, xml_region = :xml_region, xml_postal_code = :xml_postal_code, xml_home_phone = :xml_home_phone, xml_work_phone = :xml_work_phone, xml_email = :xml_email, xml_contact_name = :xml_contact_name, xml_product_code = :xml_product_code, xml_description = :xml_description, xml_item_description = :xml_item_description, xml_serial_number = :xml_serial_number, xml_invoice_number = :xml_invoice_number, xml_problem_description = :xml_problem_description, xml_method_of_repair = :xml_method_of_repair, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE trans_dtl_new_claim_id = :trans_dtl_new_claim_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_trans_dtl_new_claim ( transaction_log_header_id, item_number, response, response_detail, xml_claim_number, xml_created_date, xml_service_center_code, xml_customer_name, xml_identification_number, xml_address1, xml_address2, xml_city, xml_region, xml_postal_code, xml_home_phone, xml_work_phone, xml_email, xml_contact_name, xml_product_code, xml_description, xml_item_description, xml_serial_number, xml_invoice_number, xml_problem_description, xml_method_of_repair, created_by, trans_dtl_new_claim_id ) VALUES ( :transaction_log_header_id, :item_number, :response, :response_detail, :xml_claim_number, :xml_created_date, :xml_service_center_code, :xml_customer_name, :xml_identification_number, :xml_address1, :xml_address2, :xml_city, :xml_region, :xml_postal_code, :xml_home_phone, :xml_work_phone, :xml_email, :xml_contact_name, :xml_product_code, :xml_description, :xml_item_description, :xml_serial_number, :xml_invoice_number, :xml_problem_description, :xml_method_of_repair, :created_by, :trans_dtl_new_claim_id )
